content.title: Samen VVV
content.description: Het is opgericht door vrijwilligers uit verschillende in Nederland wonende beroepsgroepen die zich inzetten voor de rechtsstaat, democratie en mensenrechten. Ons team bestaat voornamelijk uit mensen die Turkije om politieke redenen hebben verlaten.

content.title: Lotus van de Media
content.description: Als mensenrechtenschendingen openbaar worden gemaakt, zullen schendingen afnemen of eindigen.

content.title: Software
content.description: Om nauwkeurige informatie met het publiek te delen over de mensenrechtenschendingen die plaatsvonden in Turkije en de Turkse staat in andere landen, en de daaruit voortvloeiende grieven.

content.title: Kunsthalte
content.description: Wees de stem voor vrijheid (WSVV) Met het publiek nauwkeurige informatie delen over de mensenrechtenschendingen die plaatsvonden in Turkije en de Turkse staat in andere landen, en de daaruit voortvloeiende grieven.

content.title: Samen VVV
content.description: It was founded by volunteers from various professions living in the Netherlands who support the rule of law, democracy and human rights. Our team mainly consists of people who left Turkey for political reasons.

content.title: Lotus van de Media
content.description: As human rights violations are made public, violations will decrease or end.

content.title: Software
content.description: To share with the public accurate information about the human rights violations that took place in Turkey and the Turkish state in other countries, and the resulting grievances.

content.title: Kunsthalte
content.description: Wees de stem voor vrijheid (WSVV) To share with the public accurate information about the human rights violations that took place in Turkey and the Turkish state in other countries, and the resulting grievances.

content.title: Samen VVV
content.description: Hukukun üstünlüğünü, demokrasi ve insan haklarını destekleyen, Hollanda’da yaşayan değişik meslek sahibi gönüllüler tarafından kurulmuştur. Ekibimiz ağırlıklı olarak Türkiye’yi siyasi nedenlerle terk eden kişilerden oluşur.

content.title: Lotus van de Media
content.description: İnsan hakları ihlalleri kamuoyuna paylaşıldıkça ihlaller azalacak veya sona erecektir.

content.title: Yazılım
content.description: Türkiye’de meydana gelen ve Türk devletinin diğer ülkelerde yaptığı insan hakları ihlallerini, bundan dolayı oluşan mağduriyetler konusundaki doğru bilgiyi kamuoyuyla paylaşmak.

content.title: Kunsthalte
content.description: Wees de stem voor vrijheid (WSVV) Türkiye’de meydana gelen ve Türk devletinin diğer ülkelerde yaptığı insan hakları ihlallerini, bundan dolayı oluşan mağduriyetler konusundaki doğru bilgiyi kamuoyuyla paylaşmak.
